That goose on dust II has some seriously deep character development if you pay careful attention. It really makes the whole story of the game warm, fuzzy and believeable. 

Not sure if I am too fond of all the killing, though.

Bonuspoints for the poofing chickens.

Game went free (although i've paid for it), game died. Every match at least 2 blatant cheaters. Playing on Distinguished Master Guardian. Paid bullsh- prime. There's nowhere we can send the demos of cheaters (i have them all saved JIC). Reporting steam profile does nothing. Uninstalled CSGO. Selled all skins and items. Bye and welcome Riot's next games.
